data.news_body: Financial Results for the quarter ended September 30, 2023 and Press Release & Earnings Release

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Analyst / Investor Meet - Intimation
data.news_body: Pursuant to Regulation 30 of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, we wish to inform you that the Board of Directors of the Company post approval and declaration of unaudited Financial Results (standalone & consolidated) for the quarter and half year ended September 30, 2023 ('Results'), will hold its earnings conference call for shareholders, investors and analyst on Monday, November 06, 2023 at 08:00 A.M. (IST) w.r.t. the Results.Management Attendees:Mr. Yashish Dahiya, Chairman & CEOMr. Alok Bansal, Executive Vice Chairman & Whole-time Director Mr. Sarbvir Singh, Joint Group CEOMr. Naveen Kukreja, CEO, PaisabazaarMr. Mandeep Mehta, Group CFOMs. Rasleen Kaur, Head, Corporate Strategy and Investor RelationsPlease see below the mandatory pre-registration Registration Link for joining the earnings call:https://zoom.us/meeting/register/tJwoceihrz0rHtWK2BH7QAuvMPRDfJygfECfi. Investors must pre-register to join this call using the Investor Registration Link.ii. Once registered, an email will be sent with important details for this call such as the call, date and time, as well as a full list of participant dial in numbers to join the call. Further, the transcript and an audio recording will be made available on the website of the Company at www.pbfintech.in. You are requested to kindly take the same in your records.

data.news_body: Dear Sir / Ma'amIn furtherance to our earlier communication dated May 26, 2022 and pursuant to Regulation 30 of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015 ('LODR'), we wish to inform you that audio recording of earnings conference call conducted on May 28, 2022, has been uploaded on the website of the Company at  https://kvgo.com/citi/PB-Fintech-Earnings-Update-May-2022 You are requested to kindly take the same in your records.

data.caption: Outcome Of Board Meeting - Financial Results For The Quarter And Year Ended March 31, 2022
data.news_body:
Dear Sir/Madam,

In furtherance to our earlier communication dated May 19, 2022 and pursuant to provisions of the Regulation 30 and 33 of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015 ('LODR'), we wish to inform you that the Board of Directors of the Company at its meeting held today i.e. Friday, May 27, 2022, which was commenced at 06:30 P.M. and concluded at 09:20 P.M., inter-alia, considered and approved the following business(es):

(i) Audited Standalone and Consolidated Financial Results of the Company for the quarter and year ended March 31, 2022 alongwith Statutory Auditor's Report thereon ('Results') as enclosed herewith. The said results are being uploaded on the website of the Company at www.pbfintech.in pursuant to Regulation 46 of the LODR and will be published in the newspapers in compliance with the Regulation 47 of the LODR;

(ii) Earning release dated May 27, 2022, on the Results as enclosed herewith;

(iii) Others as attached herewith.
